text: Joe Turkel (July 15, 1927 - June 27, 2022) is an American character actor of movie and television. He is mostly known for his roles in Blade Runner and in The Shining. Turkel was born in Brooklyn, New York City. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:2022 deaths Category:20th-century American actors Category:21st- century American people Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:People from Brooklyn Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Joe Turkel
